Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 發出濃烈味道的中藥。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 在地上捡到的口香糖。

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 一支乾淨的水。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一支干净的水。
English (United States)(en-US): Unopened bottle of water.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一件女性的上衣。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一条染上了血迹的毛巾。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 在张德军家拾到的一条抽屉钥匙。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 陈师奶的搬迁同意书。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 笑笑的搬迁同意书。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 郑雨婷的搬迁同意书。

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 王阳的搬迁同意书， 不过怎么看着有点奇怪？

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 余偉雄的搬遷同意書。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 余伟雄的搬迁同意书。
English (United States)(en-US): Weihung Yu's signed relocation consent form.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 眼鏡造型朱古力，很有懷舊的感覺。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 眼镜造型朱古力，很有怀旧的感觉。
English (United States)(en-US): The eyeglass shape of this pack of chocolates is very nostalgic.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 涂抺在身上能有助医治扭伤。
English (United States)(en-US): Applying it to the body can help heal sprains.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一条原先张德军配戴的颈饰。
English (United States)(en-US): A pendant on a red string that Dagwan Cheung has been seen wearing.

Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 这是谁的玉戒指？
English (United States)(en-US): Whose jade ring is this?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 上面有著和首飾箱子上一樣的花型圖案。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 上面有着和首饰箱子上一样的花型图案。
English (United States)(en-US): The patterns engraved on it are the same as the ones on the jewellery box.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 在地上撿到的打火機。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 在地上捡到的打火机。
English (United States)(en-US): A lighter picked up from the ground.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 在儲物室拿到的燈管。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 在储物室拿到的灯管。
English (United States)(en-US): Tube light bulb used in the hallways found in the store room.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 笑笑給我的紙花，看樣子似乎是忘憂草。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 笑笑给我的纸花，看样子似乎是忘忧草。
English (United States)(en-US): A paper flower folded by Smiley.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 一個用膠袋包緊的東西，裡面是藥嗎？
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一个用胶袋包紧的东西，里面是药吗？
English (United States)(en-US): It's tightly sealed with a rubber band. What could be inside here?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 石妍丟掉的鑽石戒指，是她舊愛所贈送。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 石妍丢掉的钻石戒指，是她旧爱所赠送。
English (United States)(en-US): The diamond ring tossed by Yin Shek from her ex.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 一粒戒指造型的糖果。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一粒戒指造型的糖果。
English (United States)(en-US): A lollipop in the shape of a ring loved by kids everywhere.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 一把可以用來開啟一樓垃圾房的鑰匙。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一把可以用来开启一楼垃圾房的钥匙。
English (United States)(en-US): A key to the garbage room on the first floor.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 可以用來打開儲物室。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 可以用来打开储物室。
English (United States)(en-US): A key to the store room.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 一包紙巾。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 一包纸巾。
English (United States)(en-US): A pack of tissues.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 用於對付方娟靈體的神聖道具。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 用于对付方娟灵体的神圣道具。
English (United States)(en-US): A sacred tool used to deal with Guen Fong's spirit body.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 謝恩喬作為報答贈送的橡皮筋，不知有何作用。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 谢恩乔作为报答赠送的橡皮筋，不知有何作用。
English (United States)(en-US): A used hair elastic from Yankiew Tse, what is the point of this?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 不知明的嬰兒胚胎？？
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 不知明的婴儿胚胎？ ？
English (United States)(en-US): Unknown fetus, wtf?!

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 去志雄夜總會一定能讓各位大叔玩得盡興啊。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 去志雄夜总会一定能让各位大叔玩得尽兴啊。
English (United States)(en-US): Going to Chui Hung Nightclub will surely be a great time.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 到底有多渣啊？不過這女生看著有點眼熟啊。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 到底有多渣啊？不过这女生看着有点眼熟啊。
English (United States)(en-US): How sleazy is she? This picture does look familiar though.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 夏藍帶你走進神秘的歡樂世界。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 夏蓝带你走进神秘的欢乐世界。
English (United States)(en-US): Ha Lam will take you into a mysterious world of joy.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 昌榮樓的安靜出走，誰會掃啊﹗
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 昌荣楼的安静出走，谁会扫啊﹗
English (United States)(en-US): Leave Cheung Wing Building quietly, do it soon!

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 聽說這賓館曾經在某個房間發現過斷肢…
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 听说这宾馆曾经在某个房间发现过断肢…
English (United States)(en-US): Rumour has it that a severed limb was found left in a room in this hotel.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 正所謂一動不如一靜，無裝修是最好的裝修。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 正所谓一动不如一静，无装修是最好的装修。
English (United States)(en-US): As the saying goes, a deliberate inaction is better than a blind action. No decoration is the best decoration.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 這份日報很有名，內容豐富，人渣必看。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 这份日报很有名，内容丰富，人渣必看。
English (United States)(en-US): This daily newspaper is very famous, rich in content, and a must-read for scumbags.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): WOW，住進去肯定波濤洶湧……不過業主求死是甚麼鬼？
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): WOW，住进去肯定波涛汹涌……不过业主求死是什么鬼？
English (United States)(en-US): Wow, the real estate market is rough, but isn't saying "owner is begging to die" a bit dramatic?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 小林這麼久沒出場，原來改行做地產啦？
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 小林这么久没出场，原来改行做地产啦？
English (United States)(en-US): I haven't heard of this real estate company before.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 隨地吐痰黑人憎﹗由這四個人來扮演實在最適合不過。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 随地吐痰黑人憎﹗由这四个人来扮演实在最适合不过。
English (United States)(en-US): People who spit are disgusting! This poster illustrates it well.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 哇﹗電召的士﹗……………弄成這樣誰會坐啊﹗
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 哇﹗电召的士﹗ ……………弄成这样谁会坐啊﹗
English (United States)(en-US): Who would call this taxi?!

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 真不錯呢，在這招貼之下就有一堆亂拋的垃圾…
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 真不错呢，在这招贴之下就有一堆乱抛的垃圾…
English (United States)(en-US): It must have worked. There's a lot of garbage under this poster.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 聽說此廣告一出，維他媽、維他妹、維他姐、維他姑、維他嫂、維他娘也紛紛效法。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 听说此广告一出，维他妈、维他妹、维他姐、维他姑、维他嫂、维他娘也纷纷效法。
English (United States)(en-US): After this advertisement with Miss Vitama spokespeople came out, it wasn't long until Mrs. Vitama, Mama Vitama, and Gramma Vitama all followed suit.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 提醒人不要亂拋的垃圾的單張。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 提醒人不要乱抛的垃圾的单张。
English (United States)(en-US): A poster reminding people not to litter.

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 普洱汽水可能是世界上最好喝的汽水，不過這模特兒怎麼跟某人哪麼像？
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 普洱汽水可能是世界上最好喝的汽水，不过这模特儿怎么跟某人哪么像？
English (United States)(en-US): Pu-erh soda may be the best tasting soda in the world. Does this model look familiar?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 禁煙的海報………但是為何禁煙就可以左擁右抱﹗怎麼可能啊﹗
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 禁烟的海报………但是为何禁烟就可以左拥右抱﹗怎么可能啊﹗
English (United States)(en-US): This makes no sense, what does no smoking have to do with this picture?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 聽說這小背心一點都不保暖，誰會買啊。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 听说这小背心一点都不保暖，谁会买啊。
English (United States)(en-US): This vest looks really skimpy, who would buy this?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 莫非這碗就是傳說中的刻骨銘心初戀金銀情侶套餐裡的車仔麵？
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 莫非这碗就是传说中的刻骨铭心初恋金银情侣套餐里的车仔面？
English (United States)(en-US): Is this the legendary cart noodles that everyone talks about?

Chinese (Traditional)(zh-TW): 這年頭，應該沒人不注重衛生了吧。
Chinese (Simplified)(zh-CN): 这年头，应该没人不注重卫生了吧。
English (United States)(en-US): These days, everyone should pay attention to hygiene.
